page.title: 20POLICE WORK
page.content: THE WORK FOR THE POLICEMAN IN THIS AREA IS MAINLY PATROLLING,MAKING FRIENDLY CALLS TO THE LOCAL PEOPLE. THE CRIME RATE FOR THE AREA IS LOW BUT THERE IS THE ODD THEFT OR ACT OF VANDALISM.ONE OF THE WORST CRIMES IN THIS AREA WAS THE THEFT OF A CAR VALUED AT{Â£2000.}IN{1983}THERE WERE{8 BREAK_INS,HOWEVER THE NUMBER ROSE IN {1984}TO{13}AND DROPPED AGAIN IN{1985. THE PATROL CAR MAKES APPROXIMATELY {12}TO{20}CALLS IN{8}HOURS, CHECKING THAT ALL IS WELL. ANOTHER MAJOR JOB OF THE POLICE IS ATTENDING ROAD ACCIDENTS WHICH REGULARLY OCCUR ON THE{A94. IN{1984}THERE WERE{12}ACCIDENTS ON THIS ROAD.
